title: Crushing It
description: After an epic grounding for some bad decisions with even worse friends, Tommy is lucky to even go to the Door Tech March Break camp. There, he crosses paths with Carter Batudev, and chemistry isn’t just for the classroom. With love and a renewed interest in STEM, Tommy returns home to Parry Sound, where, to the relief of his parents, he makes better friends, and joins the STEM club.When the club goes to the province-wide competition in Toronto, he's reunited with Carter, whose team is also competing. Thus ensues a wild long weekend full of romance, hijinks, STEM, and singing.Includes a novelette from Carter’s POV at the dinner theatre show Knights of Everdome.This book takes place in an alternate world where technology is more advanced, especially in Westmeath, due to in-universe reasons.
author: Jen Desmarais
